description: The REFERRAL_CVG_AUTH contains coverage auth/cert information for referrals.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUTH_CERT_CVG_ID
columns.description: Coverage ID for Auth/Cert information

columns.name: PRE_CERT_REQ_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether pre-cert is required for this coverage


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PRE_CERT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Pre-certification status for this coverage


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PRE_CERT_AGENCY_ID
columns.description: ID of the agency used for precertification

columns.name: PRE_CERT_AGENCY_ID_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the agency.

columns.name: PRE_CERT_AGENCY_PH
columns.description: Phone number of the agency used for precertification

columns.name: PRE_CERT_CONTACT
columns.description: Contact individual for the pre-certification agency

columns.name: PRE_CERT_CALLED_DT
columns.description: Date on which the payor was called for pre-certification information

columns.name: PRE_CERT_RECV_DT
columns.description: Date on which pre-certification information was received

columns.name: PRE_CERT_RCV_ID
columns.description: User who received pre-certification information

columns.name: PRE_CERT_FAX
columns.description: Fax number for pre-certification information

columns.name: PRE_CERT_BN_REQ_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a pre-certification benefits check is required


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRE_CERT_REQ_YN

columns.name: PRE_CERT_BEN_STS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Status of the pre-certification benefits


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PRE_CERT_BEN_CHECK
columns.description: Individual from whom pre-cert benefits information was received

columns.name: PRE_CERT_BEN_PHONE
columns.description: Phone number to use for pre-cert benefits checking

columns.name: PRE_CERT_BEN_CNCT
columns.description: Contact person for pre-cert benefits checking

columns.name: PRE_CERT_BEN_FAX
columns.description: Fax number for pre-cert benefits checking

columns.name: PRE_CERT_BEN_CK_DT
columns.description: Date on which pre-cert benefits were checked

columns.name: PRE_CERT_BN_USR_ID
columns.description: ID of user who checked pre-cert benefits information

columns.name: PRE_CERT_CLIN_CNCT
columns.description: Contact individual for pre-cert clinical information

columns.name: PRE_CERT_CLIN_PHON
columns.description: Phone number for pre-cert clinical information

columns.name: AUTH_FROM_DT
columns.description: The beginning date of the period authorized by the payor

columns.name: AUTH_TO_DT
columns.description: The end date of the period authorized by the payor.

columns.name: MAX_OUT_POCKET
columns.description: Contains Maximum Out of Pocket Amount: The most you pay in coinsurance during a benefit plan year. After you reach your out-of-pocket maximum, your medical plan option pays 100% (unless balance billing applies) of eligible expenses for the remainder of the benefit plan year

columns.name: LIFETIME_MAX
columns.description: Contains Lifetime Maximum Amount: The maximum amount that the insurance company will cover for this patient over the course of their lifetime.

columns.name: TOT_PT_AMOUNT
columns.description: Contains Total Patient Amount: The total amount the patient owes for this visit

columns.name: ADM_NOTIF_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains admission notification status: A field that can be used to track the status of the admission notification that needs to be faxed or sent electronically to the payor. This is a customer-owned category list.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CONC_REV_REQD_YN
columns.description:
Contains Information on whether a concurrent review (clinical review) is required or not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: IN_NETWORK_YN
columns.description:
This field is used to track whether or not the patientï¿½s insurance is in Network.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CONC_REV_REQD_YN

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE_MET_YN
columns.description:
A deductible is the amount you must pay before the Plan begins to pay benefits. This field tracks whether or not the patient has paid that amount.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CONC_REV_REQD_YN

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE_MET_AMT
columns.description: Contains Deductible Met Amount. A deductible is the amount you must pay before the Plan begins to pay benefits. This field tracks how much the patient has paid.

columns.name: COINSUR_MET_YN
columns.description:
Coinsurance is a percentage of an eligible expense that you are required to pay for a covered service.  This field tracks whether or not the patient has paid that amount.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CONC_REV_REQD_YN

columns.name: COINSURANCE_MET_AMT
columns.description: Contains coinsurance met amount. Coinsurance is a percentage of an eligible expense that you are required to pay for a covered service.  This field tracks how much the patient has paid.

columns.name: OUT_POCKET_MET_YN
columns.description:
This fields tracks whether or not the patient has paid their out of pocket expenses.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CONC_REV_REQD_YN

columns.name: OUT_POCKET_MET_AMT
columns.description: Contains Out of Pocket Met Amount. This fields tracks how much the patient has paid towards their out of pocket expenses.

columns.name: PREEXIST_COND_YN
columns.description:
Contains whether or not pre-existing conditions are present. It is used to track whether or not the patient has pre-existing conditions that may impact their benefits.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CONC_REV_REQD_YN

columns.name: PREEXIST_COND_VAL
columns.description: Contains Pre-existing conditions value. If the patient has pre-existing conditions that may impact their benefits, this field is used to document the pre-existing conditions.

columns.name: PRECERT_CMT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note containing pre-certification comments entered on the referral.

columns.name: PRECERT_BEN_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note containing benefits information entered on the referral.
